name: Crisco's Door County Cherry Pie
author: Annita Layton

ingredients.name: (16 oz.) cans pitted red tart cherries in water

instructions: For filling, drain cherries, reserving 1 cup liquid. Combine 1 cup sugar and cornstarch in medium saucepan. Stir in cherries and reserved 1 cup liquid. You will not use all of liquid. Cook and stir on medium heat until mixture comes to a boil. Boil for 1 minute. Cool while preparing crust. Preheat oven to 425°. Spoon half of cherry filling into unbaked pie shell. Bake at 425° for 15 minutes. For cream cheese layer, beat cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla extract in small bowl at medium speed of electric mixer until smooth. Beat in eggs until blended. Remove pie from oven. Spoon cream cheese mix- ture over cherries. Reduce oven temperature to 375°. Top with remaining cherry mixture. Return to oven for 20 minutes. Cool to room temperature. For topping, place spoonfuls of sour cream around edge of pie. Makes one 9-inch pie.
